data.eml:eml: List of the specimens of British animals in the collection of the British Museum. Part VI. - Hymenoptera Aculeata.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Smith, F. (1851): List of the specimens of British animals in the collection of the British Museum. Part VI. - Hymenoptera Aculeata. London: British Museum, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/8200/8200.pdf
